name: Fix The TV
description:
(Load time depends on your Wifi connection)

You just came home from work, you want to watch 
tv then the tv is broken you are told to touch the
green box that appears on the tv.

This game is still on development (Prototype) and 
set to release at early 2023 with 3d and unreal engine
so sorry if the quality is so poorly made...

Platform Support:

  1. Windows
  2. Linux
  3. Mac
  4. Android
  5. IOS
